name: Shut up and take my money
name_original: Shut up and take my money
description:
Your ammo is also your health, so use it wisely! Shoot the green piles  to cash in some score. Get ammo/health back by killing the enemies.

Controls:

Movement  - WASD

Shoot Money - Left MouseButton

Melee attack - Right MouseButton

Made by

MicroIce  - Game Design and Programming

To - Art/Fx/UI and Animations

Mandru - Programming

Nerfherder - Programming

dee.monuar - Music and SFX

funnypunk - Programming
